name: Dueling On Ice
description:
Fight against both the ice and your opponent in this high octane game. Determine who is the real opponent: the other player, or the physics of the game.

Player 1 - A and D to move, G to parry and J to thrust

Player 2 - Left and Right to move, , to parry and / to thrust

escape key to quit

Made by Jacqui and Max for the 1UP Game jam as our first unity project. That's why it is the way it is.

have fun :)
